trends: There have been 14 other sightings in New Haven
There were no other sightings in New Haven on or around January 25th 2009
Summary: It appeared as a UAV (unmanned air vehicle).
divs: sighting detailsi was driving down interstate 95 under conditions of dense traffic. at the first appearance of the ufo my first thoughts were that it was two parking lot light builds attached to a tall pole. the ufo appeared under circumstances of murky air. the air was dark and thick like a fog and so the craft was hard to make-up. it appeared to glide across the sky at a constant rate of speed and glided right above my car giving us a look at its underside. it continued to float across the night sky at a constant state of speed until it left our view of the horizen. the best way for me to describe the way the craft appeared is by enclosing this link of a uav. http:\\www.thaitechnics.com\aircraft\tg2\uav_predator2.jpg
